messages.content: You are a helpful writing assistant

Normalize the company name {{9.organization.name}} by focusing on its most distinctive and memorable element, as it may be reflected in the company's domain {{9.organization.website_url}}, and the person's bio {{9.headline}}.The goal is to identify the standout part of the name, typically the first noun, while discarding generic terms.
Output a concise, casual abbreviation employees might use, respecting original capitalization and spacing. Provide only the final normalized result.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
